[i](Any opponent may attack this battle and any player may block to protect it. When it's defeated, transform it, then the victor joins your team.)[/i]
At the beginning of each upkeep you gain 1 life.

• You cannot form a team unless you have two or more opponents.
• Teams cannot have more than two players.
• If a player joins a team, they leave any team they were previously on.
• If any player loses the game and only two player remain then all teams are disbanded.
 • You may not attack your teammate. 
• You may block creatures attacking your teammate, planeswalkers, or battles they control.
